trans-unit.source: Extends the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref> interface by providing advanced sorting and filtering capabilities.
With the IBindingListView interface, you implement advanced sorting as a set of property descriptor-direction pairs.
You implement filtering as a string to be interpreted by the data source implementation.
The IBindingListView interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
Sorts the data source based on the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref>.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is a read-only collection, once constructed.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> containing the sorts to apply to the data source.
Gets or sets the filter to be used to exclude items from the collection of items returned by the data source

Your implementation of the Filter property should exhibit the following behavior when the Filter property is set: The data source returns only the items that meet the filter criteria when the list is accessed by item index or when the list is enumerated.

The definition of the filter string is dependent on the data-source implementation, but the behavior associated with setting the filter should be modeled on <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The string used to filter items out in the item collection returned by the data source.
Removes the current filter applied to the data source.
With the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> type, you implement filtering as a string to be interpreted by the data source implementation.
Gets the collection of sort descriptions currently applied to the data source.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is a read-only collection, once constructed.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> currently applied to the data source.
Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports advanced sorting.
Advanced sorting refers to the ability to sort by multiple columns.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source supports advanced sorting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports filtering.
With the SupportsFiltering property, you implement filtering as a string to be interpreted by the data source implementation.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source supports filtering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
